oldentry: Popular explanation: pulling the rim of a hat down.
verblex: 1. To put on a cap or a hat.
2. Of a cap, to have a pointed or rounded part that sticks out above your eyes. English = (be) peaked.
nomlex: 1. A soft, flat hat which is usually worn by men or boys. English = cap.
2. A cap that has a pointed or rounded part that sticks out above your eyes. English = peaked cap. American English = baseball cap.
